#summary How to update the links to BMRB, RECOORD, DRESS.
#labels Phase-Support,Featured

= Introduction =

Each record in NRG can be linked to the above 3 databases. The information is present in
{{{
http://code.google.com/p/nmrrestrntsgrid/source/browse/#svn/trunk/nmrrestrntsgrid/bmrb_pdb_match
and should be copied to:
http://www.bmrb.wisc.edu/servlet_data/viavia/bmrb_pdb_match/
}}}

= Updating =
As docr@grunt update the database fields:
{{{
java -Xmx128m Wattos.Episode_II.MRUpdateLinksToExternalDBs $resultDir
}}}
with $resultDir being the directory (not url) to: servlet_data/viavia/bmrb_pdb_match/results
